verses.verse: And it came <S%H1961><s%> about in the eleventh <S%H259><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the third <S%H7992><s%> [month, <S%H2320><s%>] on the first <S%H259><s%> of the month, that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and to his multitude, <S%H1995><s%> 'Whom <S%H413><s%> <S%H4310><s%> are you like <S%H1819><s%> in your greatness <S%H1433><s%>?

'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> Assyria <S%H804><s%> [was] a cedar <S%H730><s%> in Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> With beautiful <S%H3303><s%> branches <S%H6057><s%> and forest <S%H2793><s%> shade, <S%H6751><s%> And very <S%H6967><s%> high; <S%H6967><s%> And its top <S%H6788><s%> was among <S%H996><s%> the clouds. <S%H5645><s%>

'The waters <S%H4325><s%> made it grow, <S%H1431><s%> the deep <S%H8415><s%> made <S%H7311><s%> it high. <S%H7311><s%> With its rivers <S%H5104><s%> it continually extended <S%H1980><s%> all <S%H5439><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> its planting <S%H4302><s%> place, <S%H4302><s%> And it sent <S%H7971><s%> out its channels <S%H8585><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field. <S%H7704><s%>

'Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> its height <S%H6967><s%> was loftier <S%H1361><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> And its boughs <S%H5634><s%> became <S%H7235><s%> many <S%H7235><s%> and its branches <S%H6288><s%> long <S%H748><s%> Because <S%H4480><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> as it spread <S%H7971><s%> them out.

'All <S%H3605><s%> the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%> nested <S%H7077><s%> in its boughs, <S%H5589><s%> And under <S%H8478><s%> its branches <S%H6288><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H9130><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> gave <S%H3205><s%> birth, <S%H3205><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> under its shade. <S%H6738><s%>

'So it was beautiful <S%H3302><s%> in its greatness, <S%H1433><s%> in the length <S%H753><s%> of its branches; <S%H1808><s%> For its roots <S%H8328><s%> extended <S%H1961><s%> to many <S%H7227><s%> waters. <S%H4325><s%>

'The cedars <S%H730><s%> in God's garden <S%H1588><s%> could not match <S%H6004><s%> it; The cypresses <S%H1265><s%> could not compare <S%H1819><s%> with its boughs, <S%H5589><s%> And the plane <S%H6196><s%> trees <S%H6196><s%> could not match its branches. <S%H6288><s%> No <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> in God's garden <S%H1588><s%> could compare <S%H1819><s%> with it in its beauty. <S%H3308><s%>

'I made <S%H6213><s%> it beautiful <S%H3303><s%> with the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of its branches, <S%H1808><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of Eden, <S%H5731><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were in the garden <S%H1588><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> were jealous <S%H7065><s%> of it.

'Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Because <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> it is high <S%H1361><s%> in stature, <S%H6967><s%> and it has set <S%H5414><s%> its top <S%H6788><s%> among <S%H996><s%> the clouds, <S%H5645><s%> and its heart <S%H3824><s%> is haughty <S%H7311><s%> in its loftiness, <S%H1363><s%>

therefore, I will give <S%H5414><s%> it into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of a despot <S%H9012><s%> of the nations; <S%H1471><s%> he will thoroughly <S%H6213><s%> deal <S%H6213><s%> with it. According to its wickedness <S%H7562><s%> I have driven <S%H1644><s%> it away. <S%H1644><s%>

"And alien <S%H2114><s%> tyrants <S%H6184><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> have cut <S%H3772><s%> it down <S%H3772><s%> and left <S%H5203><s%> it; on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> the valleys <S%H1516><s%> its branches <S%H1808><s%> have fallen, <S%H5307><s%> and its boughs <S%H6288><s%> have been broken <S%H7665><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the ravines <S%H650><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> have gone <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from its shade <S%H6738><s%> and left <S%H5203><s%> it.

"On its ruin <S%H4658><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%> will dwell. <S%H7931><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H9130><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> will be on its [fallen] branches <S%H6288><s%>

in order <S%H4616><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> by the waters <S%H4325><s%> may not be exalted <S%H1361><s%> in their stature, <S%H6967><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> set <S%H5414><s%> their top <S%H6788><s%> among <S%H996><s%> the clouds, <S%H5645><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> their well-watered mighty <S%H9012><s%> ones stand <S%H5975><s%> [erect] in their height. <S%H6967><s%> For they have all <S%H3605><s%> been given <S%H5414><s%> over to death, <S%H4194><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%> beneath, <S%H8482><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> with those who go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit. <S%H953><s%> "

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "On the day <S%H3117><s%> when it went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Sheol <S%H7585><s%> I caused <S%H56><s%> lamentations; <S%H56><s%> I closed <S%H3680><s%> the deep <S%H8415><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> it and held <S%H4513><s%> back <S%H4513><s%> its rivers. <S%H5104><s%> And [its] many <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> were stopped <S%H3607><s%> up, and I made Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> mourn <S%H6937><s%> for it, and all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> wilted <S%H5968><s%> away <S%H5968><s%> on account <S%H5921><s%> of it.

"I made the nations <S%H1471><s%> quake <S%H7493><s%> at the sound <S%H6963><s%> of its fall <S%H4658><s%> when I made it go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Sheol <S%H7585><s%> with those who go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit; <S%H953><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the well-watered trees <S%H6086><s%> of Eden, <S%H5731><s%> the choicest <S%H4005><s%> and best <S%H2896><s%> of Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> were comforted <S%H5162><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> beneath. <S%H8482><s%>

"They also <S%H1571><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> with it to Sheol <S%H7585><s%> to those who were slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and those who were its strength <S%H2220><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> under its shade <S%H6738><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

"To which <S%H4310><s%> among the trees <S%H6086><s%> of Eden <S%H5731><s%> are you thus <S%H3602><s%> equal <S%H1819><s%> in glory <S%H9202><s%> and greatness <S%H1433><s%>? Yet you will be brought <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> with the trees <S%H6086><s%> of Eden <S%H5731><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%> beneath; <S%H8482><s%> you will lie <S%H7901><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> with those who were slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword. <S%H2719><s%> So is Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his multitude! <S%H1995><s%> '"declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%> "
